Reviews.Title: “STAY AWAY”
Reviews.Author: Nathan_80
Reviews.Content: hotel situated 10 minutes walking distance termini considered standard size money rome arrived vacation father booking 4 nights beginning decent receptionists couldnt broke simple sentence english late afternoon day air condition broke reporting reception reaction denial followed promise fixed bed time bed time arrived air condition operating receptionist offered escorting realized thats actually hotel stuff kept lying threw days decided leave probably worst costumer service experience

Reviews.Title: “Great and cheap hotel”
Reviews.Author: Resell01
Reviews.Content: little hotel situated centre rome central station nice size breakfast expected airconditioning didn´t stayed middle heat wave
